title: Kundan and Gold 'Guttapusalu' Style Bangles - Modern Twist on Tradition
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with Kundan Stone Settings. Features high-quality
brilliant-cut cubic zirconia (American Diamonds) simulating the look of Kundan. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: These bangles feature a modern 'Guttapusalu' inspired design. The gold framework is meticulously crafted with rectangular and rounded gold sections connected by bars, each studded with clusters of sparkling white Kundan-style stones (CZ). The setting is designed to emulate the traditional Kundan setting, known for its intricate craftsmanship. The minimalist design lends a contemporary touch.
colors: Radiant yellow gold with sparkling white (Kundan/CZ) stones.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranti
and even to elevate everyday outfits.
description: These bangles offer the luxurious look of traditional Kundan jewelry with a contemporary twist. The high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensure durability and lasting shine. The modern design makes them versatile enough for both traditional and modern outfits. These bangles are a true investment piece and can be cherished for generations.
